main event: An unidentified flying object was reported near Eglin AFB, Florida in 1958.
interesting points: The object was described as a white streak or trail composed of discernible particles, as well as a blinking blue light with a green trailing.
The object displayed strange irregularities and appeared to accelerate to a terrific speed, coming to a virtual standstill at one point.
Multiple observers, including a pilot and ground observers, reported seeing the object.
The object was visible in the area for approximately half an hour, with its entire path paralleling the ground for most of that time.
The report states the object appeared to be under intelligent control.
sighted object: A white streak/trail and a blinking blue light with green trailing
